review: We got this to watch Game of Thrones and it works okay for that.. but forget using HBO app for anything else... the TV gets static, flickers, lags, and does some pretty crazy things about 30-60 minutes after it's on.I hate it... but it's a required evil if we want to watch Game of Thrones without cable.For anything else like Netflix and Amazon, I use the playstation.. so much less drama.
